availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Buford C Gorham (Fayette County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer and manager. Kentucky native. Son of George Gorham and Nancy Graves Gorham. Farmer in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Manager in Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 155A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 324.
"Buford C Gorham (1825-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial #99341263, accessed April 19, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99341263.
